headline: S&P 500 Gains and Losses Today: Fiserv Stock Drops as CFO Warns of Slow Platform Growth
summary: The S&P 500 gained 0.4% on Thursday, May 15, as a report showed an uptick in retail sales but a major retailer warned of possible tariff effects.

raw.headline: S&P 500 Gains and Losses Today: Fiserv Stock Drops as CFO Warns of Slow Platform Growth
raw.summary: The S&P 500 gained 0.4% on Thursday, May 15, as a report showed an uptick in retail sales but a major retailer warned of possible tariff effects.

headline: Fiserv Stock Slumps as CFO Says Clover Growth Will Likely Remain Flat
summary: Shares of Fiserv tumbled Thursday after CFO Robert Hau said the company expects volume growth of its Clover point-of-sale system this quarter to remain roughly in line with its first-quarter results.

raw.headline: Fiserv Stock Slumps as CFO Says Clover Growth Will Likely Remain Flat

headline: Block: Neither Momentum Nor A Value Stock
summary: Block's stock struggles despite low valuation. Learn about growth vs. margins dynamics and challenges with profitability in 2025.
